plot: Philippe is a young man who agrees to be exposed for a time to a medicament in exchange for money. A voice reproduced from a loudspeaker in a abandoned store is his only contact with the suppliers of the mysterious substance.
title: La habitación contigua
plot_es: Philippe is a young man who agrees to be exposed for a time to a medicament in exchange for money. A voice reproduced from a loudspeaker in a abandoned store is his only contact with the suppliers of the mysterious substance.
